--- create_change_stream_for_table_column.sql
CREATE CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name FOR table_name(column)

--- AST
&ast.CreateChangeStream{
  Create: 0,
  Name:   &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 21,
    NameEnd: 39,
    Name:    "change_stream_name",
  },
  Watch: []*ast.ChangeStreamWatch{
    &ast.ChangeStreamWatch{
      TableName: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 44,
        NameEnd: 54,
        Name:    "table_name",
      },
      Columns: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 55,
          NameEnd: 61,
          Name:    "column",
        },
      },
      Lparen: 0,
      Rparen: 0,
    },
  },
  WatchAll: false,
  Options:  []ast.Expr(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name FOR table_name(column)
